jump_scares.spoiler: The man is suddenly grabbed by the Tall Man
As Mike rides his motorcycle the camera pans to the Tall Man. There follows a bang and Mike falls off the bike
Mike’s having a nightmare. His bed is suddenly in a graveyard where the Tall Man is buried. Suddenly zombies burst out of the ground and grab his arms
As Mike runs towards the Tall Man something scratches across the soundtrack and the Tall Man runs towards Mike
Mike opens the box from which suddenly a creature with wings jumps and screams
Jodie is suddenly jumped from behind
As Reggie creeps through the hall his wife suddenly comes out of a dark corner and screams at him
Over Jodie suddenly hands come out of the wall
Mike opens the front door and the Tall Man suddenly appears before him
Mike pulls back the curtain and sees the Tall Man standing outside the window
Behind Mike, the door flies open and the Tall Man is in the doorway
The Tall Man suddenly storms out of the bushes
After the Tall Man says “Boy” Mike is pulled into the mirror
